//　敗北！ソルちゃんは吹き飛ぶ
$gameVariables._data[355] == "地下世界アンダーワールド"
//　戦闘イベントがあれば発動
TEマップイベント呼び出し ▼戦闘イベント1
TEマップイベント呼び出し ▼戦闘イベント1 2

Dragon Wyrmling! In battle, allies and enemies
take turns attacking each other, gradually
reducing each other's HP. The first to reduce the
opponent's HP to 0 wins.

As the turns progress, each adventurer's skill
charges, and when it reaches 0, it becomes
available. Click the icon or press the cancel
button to select from the battle menu command.

Eni-sensei's skills are \i[76] Chain Slash and
\i[70] Ring of Healing. \i[76] Chain Slash
performs 3 attacks, and \i[70] Ring of Healing
slightly restores the HP of our party every 6
turns.

Also, each adventurer has various skills. Let's
check them out when a new adventurer joins.

When Sol-chan's charge is complete, she can
unleash \i[90]Sol-chan Breath. It's a powerful
blow that increases in power based on her own
team's HP, but it has a usage limit and cannot be
used again without resting.

Also, Sol-chan can use various \i[328]artifacts
that have been obtained. By using the power
charged over the number of turns, you can activate
the effects of the artifacts.
ピクチャのボタン化解除 \v[1]
